More about this digital Singapore Dollar

XSGD is a fully collateralized Singapore Dollar stablecoin, available on Avalanche C-Chain. Issued by StraitsX, it's backed 1:1 with Singapore Dollars, making it a secure and trusted option for those who want to make SGD transactions in the crypto space. Whether you’re looking for stability or new ways to trade, XSGD is designed to keep your assets backed by the power of the Singapore Dollar.
